notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Zvemukati zvako zvichavanzika mukati memazuva 7 nekuda kwe
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Zvose zvemukati mako munharaunda ino zvichavanzika uye zvichengetedzwe mukati memazuva 7, mushure mezvo hauchakwanisi kuzvidzima kana kuzvichinja. Ona zvemukati zvako pazasi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Zvose zvemukati mako muboka iri zvichavanzika uye zvichengetedzwe mukati memazuva 7, mushure mezvo hauchakwanisi kuzvidzima kana kuzvichinja. Ona zvemukati zvako pazasi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Dzvanya pane chinongedzo chenharaunda pazasi, pinda semutungamiri uye sarudza Fraud management kubva kumenyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Nhamba yezviitiko zvinogona kunge zviri zvehuori nechikamu chinosvika 75% chekuti zviri zvehuori
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sisitimu yedu otomatiki yakaona zviitiko zvinogona kunge zviri zvehuori. Unogona kutarisa zvakadzama kuburikidza neCommunity admin interface. Zvimwe zvezviitiko izvi zvingave zvisiri zvehuori saka chenjera kutsvaga zvakadzama usati wadzima zvemukati.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Zvemukati izvi zvakamisikidzwa otomatiki se zvine chepfu uchishandisa maAI algorithms anofungidzira chepfu yezvemukati. Unogona kudzima zvemukati kana zvichidikanwa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Algorithm yeAI otomatiki yakamisikidza mifananidzo inobatana nezvemukati izvi. Algorithm iyi inoongorora mifananidzo yezvinogona kunge zviri zvevakuru, zvechisimba, zvekurapa, uye zvekukurumidza. Unogona kudzima zvemukati kana zvichidikanwa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Dzimwe nguva algorithm yeAI inoverenga zvibodzwa zvisiri izvo, mune iyo kesi usanetseka, haufanire kutora chero matanho uye unogona kufuratira email iyi.
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Pfungwa itsva yabatanidzwa kune iyi pfungwa
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Pfungwa itsva yabatanidzwa kune pfungwa yako
email.user_invite_2: Dzvanya pane chinongedzo kana kuchinamira mubhara rekero yebrowser kuti ugashire kukokwa
email.reset_password_2: Kana usina kukumbira izvi, ndapota zviregerere email iyi.
email.reset_password_3: Password yako haizochinja kusvikira wapinda pane iyi link iri pamusoro uye wagadzira itsva.
